#summary django-jqmobile Installation documentation

=Introduction=

Here you will find the basic configurations required to get you started.

==Configurations==

===settings.py===

{{{

STATICFILES_DIRS = (
    # ...
    '/full/path/to/jqmobile/static/',
)

INSTALLED_APPS = (
    'django.contrib.admin',
    'mobileadmin',
)

}}}

===urls.py===

{{{

from django.conf.urls.defaults import *
from django.contrib import admin
import jqmobile

admin.autodiscover()
jqmobile.autodiscover()

urlpatterns = patterns('',
    (r'^admin/', include(admin.site.urls)),
    (r'^ma/',    include(jqmobile.site.urls)),
)

}}}
